channel.title: Suggestion: Option to track Devs posts
channel.description:
Alright, this isnt a suggestion for the Game per se, but it is a suggestion for the forums. I tried searching if someone else tried suggesting this, but no luck.
All the time when I read threads such as: Ask the devs Suggestion threads News threads
I always seem to find myself scrolling through much of the discussion only in order to find IF a dev wrote something worth reading. Either about the mod, progress or other important updates in the community.
So my suggestion is basically to create some sort of page or way to track the devs posts in the forums. I do not know how much programming or work this feature would take to add, but in my opinion it would be a very nice feature to easily get access to the latest information.
We all know how much confusement there are when other people say "ram said that and catz said that". If everyone can track these posts maybe it could also save some confusion around the forums, what do I know. All I know is I would like it. Would anyone else here?
Cheers!
[COLOR='DarkOrange'][i]Moved to proper forum - keresh[/SIZE][/i]
